Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraAdmin
Namespace: "urn:zimbraAdmin"
CheckHostnameResolve SOAP Command

Check whether a hostname can be resolved

Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required true

CheckHostnameResolveRequest

    <CheckHostnameResolveRequest [hostname="..."] /> ## CheckHostnameResolveRequest

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <CheckHostnameResolveRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
@hostname Optional (0 or 1) Type:String
Hostname

CheckHostnameResolveResponse

    <CheckHostnameResolveResponse> ## CheckHostnameResolveResponse
        <code>{code} (String)</code>
        <message>{message} (String)</message>
    </CheckHostnameResolveResponse>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <CheckHostnameResolveResponse> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/code Required (only 1) Type:{code} (String)
Code
/message Optional (0 or 1) Type:{message} (String)
Message
